title: CMO Varanasi Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 28 Medical Officer Posts
description: The Chief Medical Officer Varanasi (CMO Varanasi) has officially released the notification to fill the 28 Medical Officer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS can apply for the CMO Varanasi Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, sa...
